content: this is an adorable baby blanket studded with bobbles that make up a cute and quirky pattern this pattern includes a free video tutorial that goes into detailed step-by-step instructions including how to knit a bobble and how to customise the size of the blanket **yarn recommendations** consider a superwash wool cotton acrylic or bamboo yarn these fibres can be washed in the washing machine which makes cleaning much easier **finished measurements** size before blocking 27 w x 33 h size after blocking 29 w x 36 h **customising the size** this blanket is sized for a baby but it can be made smaller or larger to change the width of the blanket cast on a multiple of 6+1 this means you ll choose a number that is a multiple of 6 ie 32 64 120 etc and add 1 to it this is the number you will cast on ie 33 65 121 **video tutorial** watch the full tutorial here https //youtu be/3yiblnu-cly
